long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🔍 ATCapture - Free Web element Capture & Annotation Tool by ApakaTech

Capture and annotate web content seamlessly with ATCapture by ApakaTech! This free extension makes it easy to snap high-quality screenshots, add personalized annotations, and save content from any web page without limitations or watermarks.

🚀 Key Features:
📸 One-Click Capture: Grab full pages, specific areas, or visible sections of any website instantly.
✏️ Annotation Tools: Add text, shapes, highlights, and blur directly on captures to create clear, informative visuals.
🌐 Cross-Browser Compatibility: Works seamlessly across major browsers with no added setup.
💯 Completely Free: Unlike many paid tools, ATCapture provides high-quality capture and annotation features at no cost and without limits.
🆓 100% Free, No Limitations:
Enjoy all the features with zero restrictions—no hidden fees or in-app purchases. Unlike other extensions that charge for full features, ATCapture is fully free, making it ideal for students, professionals, and businesses.

🔄 How ATCapture Stands Out:
Unlimited Usage vs. Paid Competitors: Access all features for free without time limits or paywalls.
Clear Annotations vs. Complex Tools: Enjoy a simple, intuitive annotation process without cluttered, confusing tools.
No Watermarks vs. Branded Captures: Save and share clean, unbranded images perfect for presentations and reports.
💼 Perfect For:
ATCapture is ideal for educators, students, marketers, content creators, and researchers who need a simple yet powerful way to capture and annotate online content. Simplify workflows, enhance productivity, and present polished, professional visuals every time.

ATCapture by ApakaTech - The Free, Reliable Way to Capture & Annotate! 🌟
